name: Party All Night: Fun Mini Games
name_original: Party All Night: Fun Mini Games
description:
Swipe, Tap, Tilt... Crazy mini games for all styles!
Guaranteed: you will have a Laugh playing this game! Several real-life funny situations...

Download the FREE game now and challenge your Friends!

Features:
- Simple gameplays
- Funny and awkward real-life situations
- Exciting levels
- Great animations
- Challenge your Friends
- The more you play the harder it gets
